name: Modulus framework modules manifest
description: List of modules available for the Modulus framework

modules.name: urfave cli
modules.description: Adds HTTP server capabilities to the Modulus framework. Uses the CHI router.

modules.name: http router
modules.description: Adds HTTP server capabilities to the Modulus framework. Uses the CHI router.

modules.name: pgx
modules.description: A wrapper for the pgx package to integrate it into the Modulus framework.

envVars.comment: Use this variable to set the DSN for the PGX connection. It overwrites the other PG_* variables.

modules.name: db migrator
modules.description: Several CLI commands to use DBMate (https://github.com/amacneil/dbmate) migration tool inside your application.

modules.name: GraphQL gqlgen
modules.description: Integration of the GraphQL generator gqlgen (https://gqlgen.com/).

modules.name: Slog Logger with Zap Backend
modules.description: Adds a slog logger with a zap backend to the Modulus framework.

envVars.comment: Use one of "debug", "info", "warn", "error". It sets the maximum level of the fx events that should be logged
